alert.note: Alert for Orange; Rockland (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 03 at 3:53PM EDT until July 03 at 4:30PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Upton NY has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Orange County in southeastern New York... Rockland County in southeastern New York... * Until 430 PM EDT. * At 352 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Florida, or near Goshen, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Warwick and Florida around 400 PM EDT. Goshen around 405 PM EDT. Chester around 410 PM EDT. Monroe around 425 PM EDT. Harriman around 430 PM EDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
